name: Super Mario Bros: Revenge of Bowser
summary: Oh no! Princess Peach has been trapped by Bowser! Go through pipes in Peach's castle which take you all around the Mushroom Kingdom in this classic platformer, and collect the stars by finishing a level, finding 5 Ace coins, and finding the hidden shine. Can you collect all 120 stars in 40 levels, and defeat Bowser?
